metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Let It Go is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Let It Go has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Minor, E♭ Mixolydian, A♭ Major,  and C♯ Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
